articles.title: Jones insists Ireland are favourites for Six Nations showdown in England - The Guardian
articles.description: Eddie Jones has billed Ireland as favourites for Saturday’s Six Nations showdown at Twickenham describing England’s opponents as the most cohesive team in the world
